short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check the weather on the fly from a chrome extension!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Thanks for checking out "What's the Weather?"

A new chrome extension making checking the weather simple and fast!

Searching a cities name brings up the temperature, humidity, and wind speed as well as displaying the weather conditions via a picture.

As of v1.5, you are now able to change the measurement unit between Imperial and Metric.

This chrome extension is also completely open source, allowing for users to make changes they wish to implement on our official GitHub repository found here: https://github.com/DylanDevelops/weather-chrome-extension

Enjoy the extension and please leave any feedback on our official GitHub repository's issues page!
